lines.gurmukhi: jYsy pwNco qq ibKY bsuDw nvn mn; qw mY n auqpq huie smwq sB qwhI mY [

Unknown.translation: Just as Earth is most humble out of the five elements. That is why it produces so much and all that goes back to it.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ pMjwˆ q`qwˆ ivc DrqI sB qoˆ nvIˆ mn vwlI hY, qdy hI aus ivcoˆ sB kuC auqpq huMdw hY, qy ausy ivc hI smw jwˆdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy pwNco AwNgurI mY sUKm knuMgRIAw hY; kMcn Kcq ng soBq hY vwhI mY [

Unknown.translation: Just as the little finger of the hand is smallest and frail looking, yet a diamond ring is worn in it.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ pMjwˆ auˆglIAwˆ ivcoˆ cIcI sB qoˆ CotI huMdI hY qdoˆ hI ngwˆ nwl jVI sony dI muMdrI iesy ivc soBdI hY Bwv pihnI jwˆdI hY[

lines.gurmukhi: jYsy nIc jon gnIAq Aiq mwKI ikRm; hIr cIr mDu aupjq suK jwhI mY [

Unknown.translation: Just as fly and other insects are counted among the low species, yet some of them produce such valuable things like silk, pearls, honey etc;

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: ijvyˆ m`KI qy kIVy AqI nIvIAwˆ jUnIAwˆ ivc igxy jwˆdy hn, pr moqI rySm qy bsqR qy sihd ienHwˆ qoˆ hI aupjdy hn, ijnHwˆ ivcoˆ hI sB iksy nUM suK pRwpq huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: qYsy rivdws nwmw ibdr kbIr Bey; hIn jwq aUc pd pwey sB kwhI mY [632[

Unknown.translation: Similarly, saints like Bhagat Kabir, Namdev Ji, Bidar and Ravi Das Ji being low born have attained a much higher spiritual level who have blessed humanity with their precept that have made their life peaceful and comfortable.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: iqvyˆ rivdws, nwmw ibdr qy kbIr hoey hn, jwq nIvIˆ sI pr aunHwˆ ny Awpxy dYvI guxwˆ qy pRymw BgqI kr ky sB iksy ivc aucIAwˆ pdvIAwˆ pRwpq kIqIAwˆ ]632]
